1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Four recovering crime victims form an intros-only revenge for hire organization.

imdb.plot outline: They walk a karmic tightrope, following a strict code of an eye for an eye, not an eye for your eyesight. They're committed to balancing the scale, never stacking it in a client's favor - and only those who prove to have suffered a profound loss at the hands of another will be considered. But the real threat to the group isn't being revealed to the public by a careless client or, it's mitigating their own compulsions to avenge those they've lost and revealing themselves.
imdb.title: Intricate Vengeance
plot: On the dark web exists a group dealing in vengeance. When trust is betrayed, they'll come together to bring justice and get your revenge.

They walk a karmic tightrope, following a strict code of an eye for an eye, not an eye for your eyesight. They're committed to balancing the scale, never stacking it in a client's favor - and only those who prove to have suffered a profound loss at the hands of another will be considered. But the real threat to the group isn't being revealed to the public by a careless client or, it's mitigating their own compulsions to avenge those they've lost and revealing themselves.
